title: Hobby Boss WR360 C12 Locomotive Vehicle Model Building Kit
features: Includes display base - stone texture railbed with integral cross ties and separate rails and joint bars.
Decals and color painting reference for 2 German locomotives.
description: WWII era 0-6-0 Wehrmacht Regelspur 360 hp diesel switching locomotive kit. Features detailed exterior - frame, suspension, driving wheels, wheel coupling rods, buffers, couplers, boarding steps, single-piece engine housing, full cab interior, separately molded cab door, engineer's controls and injection-molded window panes.
